sentences.en: "Bravo, Rena! You're right," the students said.
sentences.cn: “好样的，雷娜！你是对的，”学生们说道。

sentences.en: Alpha-Bravo-Zulu 643 to Saltezar, do you read me? Over.
sentences.cn: 阿尔法－布拉沃－祖鲁643呼叫萨德扎，能听到我的声音吗？完毕。

sentences.en: Bravo Sport : Lukas , du wurdest ja bei der WM 2006 zum besten Youngster des Turniers gew? hlt.
sentences.cn: Bravo: 卢卡斯, 你当选为2006世界杯最佳新秀.

sentences.en: Bravo Sport war mit Poldi und Schweini unterwegs.

sentences.en: Bravo Sport zeigt euch die wichtigsten Stationen seiner Karriere.

sentences.en: Bravo Sport: Ihr seid ja auf der ganzen Welt unterwegs.

sentences.en: Dare to say you own the Lagoon, Palma Bravo!

sentences.en: Howard Hawks hit paydirt with "Rio Bravo".

sentences.en: Hung - chien couldn't help exclaiming, " Bravo , bravo! "

sentences.en: Then following, I geared up the Alpha Team to search and rescue the lost Bravo.
sentences.cn: 接下来, 我带领全副武装的Alpha小队前去搜救失去联络的Bravo小队.

sentences.en: Thousands of Ukrainians burst into cries of "bravo" on the steps of the parliament.
sentences.cn: 成千上万的乌克兰人聚集在议会门前高喊“好啊”。

sentences.en: We were together in Bravo Company, U.S. M. C.

sentences.en: Welcome to Beijing; people who have dreams are all bravo.
sentences.cn: 北京欢迎你,有梦想谁都了不起. 金莎,苏醒,韦嘉.

trans.tran_en: used to show your approval when someone, especially a performer, has done something very well
